entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 6.

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of snow. High zero. POP 60%
